array.string: <b:t>Ed is making a sandwich. For every</b:t> <b:ot tag="a">2 slices of ham </b:ot> <b:t>he puts in, he uses</b:t> <b:ot tag="b">5 slices of cheese.</b:ot> <b:t>What is the ratio of cheese to ham?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="b" enabled="no">5</b:ot> <b:op op=":" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">2</b:ot>
<b:t>What is the ratio of ham to cheese?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">2</b:ot> <b:op op=":" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="b" enabled="no">5</b:ot>
<b:t>There is only</b:t> <b:ot tag="c">4 slices of ham</b:ot> <b:t>left. How many slices of cheese will be used?</b:t>
<b:ot tag="c" enabled="no">4</b:ot> <b:op op="/" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="b" enabled="no">2</b:ot> <b:ot picker="yes" tag="d" pickerTarget="2">2</b:ot>
<b:ot tag="d" enabled="no">2</b:ot> <b:op op="x" picker="yes" /> <b:ot tag="a" enabled="no">10</b:ot> <b:ot picker="yes" pickerTarget="2">20</b:ot>
